VerseWatcher Executable Verification
==================================
File: VerseWatcher.exe
Version: a1.0.1
Build Date: 2025-03-01 19:51:23
SHA256: BF0D2F7D495ABCD76FF81991758DBBA2EE95BEA2F7DE1672743C6EC57CBC0DA0

To verify this file:
1. Open PowerShell
2. Run: Get-FileHash "path\to\VerseWatcher.exe" -Algorithm SHA256
3. Compare the hash with the one above
